segment.source: This topic provides administrators with information about what your users see and experience when you use Intune to manage their devices.
segment.target: This topic provides administrators with information about what your users see and experience when you use Intune to manage their devices.

segment.source: Where your users can find information about common tasks
segment.target: Where your users can find information about common tasks

segment.source: Share these links with your users to help them find information about enrolling their devices in Intune and doing different tasks on their devices after enrolling.
segment.target: Share these links with your users to help them find information about enrolling their devices in Intune and doing different tasks on their devices after enrolling.

segment.source: How end users get their apps
segment.target: How end users get their apps

segment.source: This section describes, for each device platform, how and where your end users get apps that you distribute through
segment.target: This section describes, for each device platform, how and where your end users get apps that you distribute through

segment.source: The following terms are used in the tables that describe how users get their apps for each platform.
segment.target: The following terms are used in the tables that describe how users get their apps for each platform.

segment.source: End users see a notification indicating that they are required to install an app.
segment.target: End users see a notification indicating that they are required to install an app.

segment.source: User taps once to download and install the app.
segment.target: User taps once to download and install the app.

segment.source: The notification displays until users install the app.
segment.target: The notification displays until users install the app.

segment.source: App downloads and installs automatically without user interaction.
segment.target: App downloads and installs automatically without user interaction.

segment.source: End users see a notification indicating that they are required to install an app.
segment.target: End users see a notification indicating that they are required to install an app.

segment.source: Clicking the app takes users to the Play Store, where they can install the app.
segment.target: Clicking the app takes users to the Play Store, where they can install the app.

segment.source: The notification displays until users install the app.
segment.target: The notification displays until users install the app.

segment.source: End users see a notification indicating that they are required to install an app.
segment.target: End users see a notification indicating that they are required to install an app.

segment.source: Clicking the app takes users to the Play Store, where they can install the app.
segment.target: Clicking the app takes users to the Play Store, where they can install the app.

segment.source: The notification displays until users install the app.
segment.target: The notification displays until users install the app.

segment.source: End users see a notification that the web link was installed on their device.
segment.target: End users see a notification that the web link was installed on their device.

segment.source: They find the list of installed web links in the Company Portal widget, which they must add to the home screen.
segment.target: They find the list of installed web links in the Company Portal widget, which they must add to the home screen.

segment.source: App appears in the Apps tab of the Company Portal.
segment.target: App appears in the Apps tab of the Company Portal.

segment.source: End users see a notification that the web link was installed on their device.
segment.target: End users see a notification that the web link was installed on their device.

segment.source: They find the list of installed web links in the Company Portal widget, which they must add to the home screen.
segment.target: They find the list of installed web links in the Company Portal widget, which they must add to the home screen.

segment.source: App appears in the Apps tab of the Company Portal.
segment.target: App appears in the Apps tab of the Company Portal.

segment.target: Web Portal (iOS Safari browser) available app

segment.source: N/A; cannot push required install on deep-linked apps; instead use managed apps

segment.source: Yes; required apps are also shown as available in Web Portal)
segment.target: Yes; required apps are also shown as available in Web Portal)

segment.source: hub in Company portal (Windows Phone 8 and Windows Phone 8.1 apps).
segment.target: hub in Company portal (Windows Phone 8 and Windows Phone 8.1 apps).

segment.source: Does not apply to Windows Phone apps.
segment.target: Does not apply to Windows Phone apps.

segment.source: Does not exist for Windows Phone Apps
segment.target: Does not exist for Windows Phone Apps
